      • setTransactionHistoryRetrievalListener

        void setTransactionHistoryRetrievalListener(ITransactionHistoryRetrievalListener listener)
        Sets the transaction data retrieval listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - the new transaction data retrieval listener. This can be either an implementation of ITransactionHistoryRetrievalListener or an extended instance of TransactionHistoryRetrievalListenerAdapter.
        See Also:
        ITransactionHistoryRetrievalListener, TransactionHistoryRetrievalListenerAdapter

      • removeListener

        void removeListener()
        Removes the transaction data retrieval listener and sets it to null.

        4.4.0.2
